title: Witness recalls 'horrific' moment gator mistaken for dog attacked man outside Florida motel
summary:
More details are emerging after a man was attacked by an alligator he mistook for a dog outside a Florida motel.
By the time he got outside, deputies were already working to bring the 7-foot gator under control.
More details are emerging after a man was attacked by an alligator he mistook for a dog outside a Florida motel.
AdvertisementThe Sarasota County Sheriff’s Office said the man was walking outside the motel and saw a figure moving along the bushes on a path.
A witness identified only as Will told WBBH he rushed outside when he heard the victim's wife screaming.
